member.name: T:Castle.MonoRail.TestSupport.AbstractMRTestCase

A list of key/value pair, for example name=johndoe

member.name: M:Castle.MonoRail.TestSupport.AbstractMRTestCase.AssertSuccess
member.summary: Asserts the return status code is less than 400

member.name: M:Castle.MonoRail.TestSupport.AbstractMRTestCase.AssertReplyEqualsTo(System.String)
member.summary: Asserts that reply has exactly the samme content of expectedContents

member.name: M:Castle.MonoRail.TestSupport.AbstractMRTestCase.AssertReplyStartsWith(System.String)
member.summary: Asserts that reply starts with expectedContents

member.name: M:Castle.MonoRail.TestSupport.AbstractMRTestCase.AssertReplyEndsWith(System.String)
member.summary: Asserts that reply ends with expectedContents

member.summary: Asserts that reply contains the specified expectedContents

member.name: M:Castle.MonoRail.TestSupport.AbstractMRTestCase.AssertReplyIsBlank
member.summary: Asserts that reply have only whitespace characters

member.name: M:Castle.MonoRail.TestSupport.AbstractMRTestCase.AssertReplyMatch(System.String)
member.summary: Asserts that reply contents match the specified pattern, ignoring any whitespaces pattern
